description: I. Understanding airport passenger experience. 81 p. II. Reforming the framework for the economic regulation of UK airports. 172 p. III. Research on the air-passenger experience at Heathrow, Gatwick, Stansted and Manchester airports. 55 p. IV. The through airport passenger experience : an assessment of the passenger experience and airport operations at Heathrow, Gatwick, Stansted and Manchester airports. 50 p.
